title: Is the patch at 8pm PDT?
body: Because you guys disabled it at 6:30 and its 10 Am now.,.. DO I really have to wait 14+ more hours???

replies.body: There's not patch that I'm aware of.  Per the current [status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce), some regions had some downtime for service maintenance.  These can end sooner or delayed, it's not any guarantee that I could make.  Let me know if that clears things up!
